definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="86" w="233">This example will test if the entity is holding a specific item. If it is true, then it will give the entity a level 2 status effect of speed for 3 seconds.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"/></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Mercurynitrate</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">GENERIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.2</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">NAUSEA</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">60</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
